description: Core UI visibility questions for Awaire Proxy - Initial release

questions.question: Is there a splash screen or loading screen visible that covers most of the window?
questions.significance: Splash presence may indicate app not fully loaded

questions.question: Is there a horizontal progress bar visible anywhere in the interface?
Is there a queue or job list panel visible on the left or right side?
Is there a video player or preview area visible in the center?
Are there zoom controls (buttons with + or -, or a slider) visible near the player area?
Are any UI elements cut off, clipped, or extending beyond the visible window boundaries?
Is there any error message, warning banner, or red-colored alert visible?
Is there a prominent action button (like 'Start', 'Render', or 'Add') visible?

interpretation_hints.splash_only_detection: If splash_visible=yes AND player_area_visible=no AND queue_panel_visible=no, app may not be fully loaded
